about_the_game:
EAGLE: Special Forces — An action-packed shooter featuring lightning-fast shootouts, bombastic music, ricochets, time-slowing, tanks, helicopters, and various enemies, each with their own battle tactics.‍

You are an EAGLE, a recruit of special security squad created to combat the mysterious terrorist organization BLACK LOTUS and maintain peace in the USA. Discover what drives BLACK LOTUS, who stands behind it, and what they want.‍

Infiltrate military bases, shoot in all directions, put everyone to sleep with bullets, or act quickly and precisely in a surgical manner! Every moment could be your last; use time slowing to dodge bullets and make shots that are beyond the capability of an ordinary person! Develop your strategy for each level by using 4 types of weapons, which could be upgraded! The enemy won’t let you relax, exploiting your weaknesses and utilizing various tactical maneuvers to achieve their goals.

America is in danger again, and one tough guy will have to save it once more!

BULLET POINTS:

  • Extremely fast-paced shootouts that can have only one winner.‍

  • Rhythmic soundtrack for saving America with style.‍

  • A storyline with unexpected twists typical of action movies. You’ll save the world with your own hands once again.‍

  • Various enemies with unique behaviors - frontal assault, camouflage, suppression fire, and coverage-to-coverage sprinting.‍

  • Upgrade your arsenal and prepare for encounters with increasingly powerful opponents.‍

  • Ride tanks, fly helicopters, shred enemies in a juggernaut suit, and take revenge for all the pain they caused!‍

  • Ricochet system for tanks; position your tank at a specific angle to the bullets and become invulnerable!‍

  • Battles in open and closed spaces!
